Symbol.Script_3D:
! Wooden Landing
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN end
IF GLOB_CONTEXT>20 and GLOB_CONTEXT<40 THEN !! for Simple MoDEL and in 3D Windoow gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_shadow=0 THEN SHADOW OFF IF gs_shadow=1 THEN SHADOW ON
PEN gs_cont_pen unID=1
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IF iLandingType = 3 THEN
HOTSPOT flwl,0,0, unID, fy, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,-1,0, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,0+fy,0, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,0,0, unID, fy, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,-1,0, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,0+fy, 0,unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,0,0, unID, flwl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0, 0,unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,0, 0,unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,0+fy,0, unID, flwl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0+fy, 0,unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,0+fy, 0,unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
IF strings THEN !!! *** BOTTOM / RIGHT direction HOTSPOT 0,0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1,0,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** BOTTOM / LEFT direction HOTSPOT flwl,0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl-1,0,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** TOP HOTSPOT flwl/2,fy,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl/2,fy-1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl/2,fy+st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,fy+st,0, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,fy+st,0, unID : unID=unID+1
!!! *** STRING HEIGHT HOTSPOT -st,0,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,fy+st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,fy+st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,fy+st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,fy+st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,fy+st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,fy+st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
ADDz -lth MATERIAL matl if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillTread, penBackFillTread, penFillTread, penLineTread
!!! slab PRISM 5, lth, 0,-ns, flwl,-ns, flwl,fy, 0,fy, 0,-ns DEL 1
ADDz -sh IF strings THEN if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillStringer, penBackFillStringer, penFillStringer, penLineStringer
MATERIAL matstr PRISM 9, sh, 0,0, 0,fy, flwl,fy, flwl,0, flwl+st,0, flwl+st,fy+st, -st,fy+st, -st,0, 0,0
ADDz softh !!! face desk MATERIAL mat_riser if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillRiser, penBackFillRiser, penFillRiser, penLineRiser
PRISM 5, sh-lth-softh, 0,0, flwl,0, flwl,lth, 0,lth, 0,0 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF soffit THEN IF strings=0 THEN ADDz sh-softh-lth MATERIAL matsoff if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillSoffit, penBackFillSoffit, penFillSoffit, penLineSoffit
PRISM 5, softh, 0,0, flwl,0, flwl,fy, 0,fy, 0,0 IF strings=0 THEN DEL 1 ENDIF DEL 1 ENDIF
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IF iLandingType = 2 THEN
fxx=flwl+fx
!!! *** Middle-bottom HOTSPOT 0,0,0, unID, flwl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0,0, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,0,0, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Left-top HOTSPOT 0,yl,0, unID, fy, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -1,0, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,fy+yl,0, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!!!!!!!! MIDDLE HOTSPOT 0,yl,0, unID, flwl, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, yl,0, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl, yl,0, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl,0,0, unID, yl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,-1,0, unID, yl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,yl,0, unID, yl, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Right-bottom HOTSPOT flwl,yl,0, unID, fx, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl-1,yl,0, unID, fx, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx,yl,0, unID, fx, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Right-top HOTSPOT flwl,yl+fy,0, unID, fx, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl-1,yl+fy,0, unID, fx, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx,yl+fy,0, unID, fx, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT fxx,yl, 0,unID, fy, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx,yl-1, 0,unID,fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx,yl+fy, 0,unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
IF strings THEN
!!! *** BOTTOM / RIGHT direction HOTSPOT 0,0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1,0,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** BOTTOM / LEFT direction HOTSPOT flwl,0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl-1,0,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** LEFT FLIGHT / Top HOTSPOT (flwl+fx),fy+yl,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT (flwl+fx),fy+yl-1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT (flwl+fx),fy+yl+st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** LEFT FLIGHT / Bottom HOTSPOT (flwl+fx),yl,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT (flwl+fx),yl+1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT (flwl+fx),yl-st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,yl-st,0, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,fy+yl+st,0, unID : unID=unID+1
!!! *** STRING HEIGHT HOTSPOT -st,0,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,yl-st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,yl-st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,yl-st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+fx,yl-st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx,yl-st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx,yl-st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+fx,fy+yl+st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx,fy+yl+st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx,fy+yl+st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -st,fy+yl+st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,fy+yl+st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,fy+yl+st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
ENDIF
ADDz -lth MATERIAL matl if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillTread, penBackFillTread, penFillTread, penLineTread
PRISM 7, lth, 0,-ns, 0,fy+yl, flwl+fx, fy+yl, flwl+fx, yl, flwl, yl, flwl,-ns, 0,-ns DEL 1
ADDz -sh IF strings THEN MATERIAL matstr if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillStringer, penBackFillStringer, penFillStringer, penLineStringer
PRISM 7, sh, 0,0, 0,yl+fy, flwl+fx,fy+yl, flwl+fx,fy+yl+st, -st, fy+yl+st, -st, 0, 0,0 PRISM 7, sh, flwl, 0, flwl, yl, flwl+fx, yl, flwl+fx, yl-st, flwl+st, yl-st, flwl+st, 0, flwl, 0
ADDz softh !!! face desk MATERIAL mat_riser if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillRiser, penBackFillRiser, penFillRiser, penLineRiser
PRISM 5, sh-lth-softh, 0,0, flwl,0, flwl,lth, 0,lth, 0,0
ADD flwl+fx,yl,0 ROTz 90 PRISM 5, sh-lth-softh, 0,0, fy,0, fy,lth, 0,lth, 0,0 DEL 2 DEL 1
ENDIF
IF soffit THEN IF strings=0 THEN ADDz sh-softh-lth MATERIAL matsoff if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillSoffit, penBackFillSoffit, penFillSoffit, penLineSoffit
PRISM 7, softh, 0,0, 0,fy+yl, flwl+fx, fy+yl, flwl+fx, yl, flwl, yl, flwl,0, 0,0 IF strings=0 THEN DEL 1 ENDIF DEL 1 ENDIF
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IF iLandingType = 1 THEN fxx=flwl+fx
!!! *** Middle-Left-Bottom HOTSPOT 0,0,0, unID, flwl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0,0, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl, 0,0, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Left-top HOTSPOT 0,yl,0, unID, fy, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -1,0, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,fy+yl,0, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Middle-Left-Top HOTSPOT 0,yl,0, unID, flwl, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, yl,0, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl, yl,0, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl,0,0, unID, yl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,-1,0, unID, yl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl,yl,0, unID, yl, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Right-Bottom HOTSPOT fxx,yl-yr,0, unID, flwr, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx-1,yl-yr,0, unID, flwr, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx+flwr,yl-yr,0, unID, flwr, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT fxx+flwr,yl,0, unID, yr, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx+flwr,yl+1,0, unID, yr, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx+flwr,yl-yr,0, unID, yr, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Middle-Right-Top HOTSPOT fxx,yl,0, unID, yr, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx,yl+1,0, unID, yr, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx,yl-yr,0, unID, yr, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl,yl,0, unID, fx, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl-1,yl,0, unID, fx, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx,yl,0, unID, fx, 2 : unID=unID+1
!! *** Right-top HOTSPOT fxx,yl+fy,0, unID, flwr, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx-1,yl+fy,0, unID, flwr, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx+flwr,yl+fy,0, unID, flwr, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT fxx+flwr,yl,0, unID, fy, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx+flwr,yl-1,0, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT fxx+flwr,yl+fy,0, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
IF strings THEN
!!! *** LEFT FLIGHT -BOTTOM/LEFT direction HOTSPOT 0,0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 1,0,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** LEFT FLIGHT -BOTTOM/RIGHT direction HOTSPOT flwl,0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl-1,0,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** RIGHT FLIGHT -BOTTOM/RIGHT direction HOTSPOT flwl+fx,yl-yr,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx+1,yl-yr,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx-st,yl-yr,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** RIGHT FLIGHT -BOTTOM/LEFT direction HOTSPOT flwl+flwr+fx,yl-yr,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+flwr+fx-1,yl-yr,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+flwr+fx+st,yl-yr,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** TOP HOTSPOT (flwl+flwr+fx)/2,fy+yl,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT (flwl+flwr+fx)/2,fy+yl,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT (flwl+flwr+fx)/2,fy+yl+st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,yl-st,0, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx-st,yl-st,0, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,fy+yl+st,0, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+flwr+fx+st,fy+yl+st,0, unID : unID=unID+1
!!! *** STRING HEIGHT HOTSPOT -st,0,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,0,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,0,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+st,yl-st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,yl-st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+st,yl-st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+fx-st,yl-st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx-st,yl-st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx-st,yl-st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+fx-st,yl-yr,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx-st,yl-yr,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx-st,yl-yr,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+fx+flwr+st,yl-yr,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx+flwr+st,yl-yr,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx+flwr+st,yl-yr,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT flwl+fx+flwr+st,fy+yl+st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx+flwr+st,fy+yl+st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT flwl+fx+flwr+st,fy+yl+st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -st,fy+yl+st,0, unID, sh, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,fy+yl+st,1, unID, sh, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -st,fy+yl+st,-sh, unID, sh, 2 : unID=unID+1
ENDIF
ADDz -lth MATERIAL matl if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillTread, penBackFillTread, penFillTread, penLineTread
PRISM 9, lth, 0,-ns, 0, yl+fy, flwl+fx+flwr, fy+yl, flwl+fx+flwr, yl-yr, flwl+fx, yl-yr, flwl+fx, yl, flwl, yl, flwl, -ns, 0,-ns DEL 1
ADDz -sh IF strings THEN MATERIAL matstr if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillStringer, penBackFillStringer, penFillStringer, penLineStringer
PRISM 9, sh, 0, 0, 0, yl+fy, flwl+flwr+fx, fy+yl, flwl+flwr+fx, yl-yr, flwl+flwr+fx+st, yl-yr, flwl+flwr+fx+st, yl+fy+st, -st, fy+yl+st, -st, 0, 0,0 PRISM 9, sh, flwl, 0, flwl, yl, flwl+fx, yl, flwl+fx, yl-yr, flwl+fx-st, yl-yr, flwl+fx-st, yl-st, flwl+st, yl-st, flwl+st, 0, flwl, 0
ADDz softh !!! face desk MATERIAL mat_riser if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillRiser, penBackFillRiser, penFillRiser, penLineRiser
PRISM 5, sh-lth-softh, 0,0, flwl,0, flwl,lth, 0,lth, 0,0 ADD flwl+fx,yl-yr,0 PRISM 5, sh-lth-softh, 0,0, flwr,0, flwr,lth, 0,lth, 0,0 DEL 1 DEL 1 ENDIF
IF soffit THEN IF strings=0 THEN ADDz sh-softh-lth MATERIAL matsoff if GLOB_CONTEXT = 4 then SECT_FILL typeFillSoffit, penBackFillSoffit, penFillSoffit, penLineSoffit
PRISM 9, softh, 0,0, 0, yl+fy, flwl+fx+flwr, fy+yl, flwl+fx+flwr, yl-yr, flwl+fx, yl-yr, flwl+fx, yl, flwl, yl, flwl, 0, 0,0 IF strings=0 THEN DEL 1 ENDIF DEL 1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Wooden Landing
!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** 2D Representation on Stories *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!! *** Stories down the story, where the object is placed on !!!!
IF GLOB_CH_STORY_DIST < -EPS THEN gs_cont_line=gs_LineUnderHStory gs_fill_type=65 gs_back_pen=0 ENDIF !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type SET LINE_TYPE gs_cont_line
unID=1
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IF iLandingType = 3 THEN
HOTSPOT2 0,fjl, unID, flwl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1,fjl, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,fjl, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0,fjl+fy, unID, flwl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1,fjl+fy, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,fjl+fy, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 0,fjl, unID, fy, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-1, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,fjl+fy, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl,fjl, unID, fy, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,-1, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,fjl+fy, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
POLY2_b 5, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, flwl,0,1, flwl,fy,1, 0,fy,1, 0,0,-1
IF strings THEN POLY2_b 9, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, 0,fy,1, flwl,fy,1, flwl,0,1, flwl+st,0,1, flwl+st,fy+st,1, -st,fy+st,1, -st,0,1, 0,0,-1
!!! *** BOTTOM / RIGHT direction HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** BOTTOM / LEFT direction HOTSPOT2 flwl,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl-1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** TOP HOTSPOT2 flwl/2,fy, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl/2,fy-1, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl/2,fy+st, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl+st,fy+st, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -st,fy+st, unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IF iLandingType = 2 THEN
!!! *** Middle-bottom HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, flwl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,0, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Left-top HOTSPOT2 0,yl, unID, fy, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -1, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,fy+yl, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!!!!!!!! MIDDLE HOTSPOT2 0,yl, unID, flwl, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, yl, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl, yl, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl,0, unID, yl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,-1, unID, yl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,yl, unID, yl, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Right-bottom HOTSPOT2 flwl,yl, unID, fx, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl-1,yl, unID, fx, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl, unID, fx, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Right-top HOTSPOT2 flwl,yl+fy, unID, fx, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl-1,yl+fy, unID, fx, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl+fy, unID, fx, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl, unID, fy, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl-1, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl+fy, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
DRAWINDEX 20 POLY2_b 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, 0,fy+yl,1, flwl+fx, fy+yl,1, flwl+fx, yl,1, flwl, yl,1, flwl,0,1, 0,0,-1
IF strings THEN DRAWINDEX 10 POLY2_b 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,0, 0,yl+fy,0, flwl+fx,fy+yl,1, flwl+fx,fy+yl+st,1, -st, fy+yl+st,1, -st, 0,1, 0,0,-1 POLY2_b 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, flwl, 0,0, flwl, yl,0, flwl+fx, yl,1, flwl+fx, yl-st,1, flwl+st, yl-st,1, flwl+st, 0,1, flwl, 0,-1
!!! *** BOTTOM / RIGHT direction HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** BOTTOM / LEFT direction HOTSPOT2 flwl,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl-1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** LEFT FLIGHT / Top HOTSPOT2 (flwl+fx),fy+yl, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (flwl+fx),fy+yl-1, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (flwl+fx),fy+yl+st, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** LEFT FLIGHT / Bottom HOTSPOT2 (flwl+fx),yl, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (flwl+fx),yl+1, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (flwl+fx),yl-st, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl+st,yl-st, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -st,fy+yl+st, unID : unID=unID+1 ENDIF ENDIF
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IF iLandingType = 1 THEN
!!! *** Middle-Left-Bottom HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, flwl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl, 0, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Left-top HOTSPOT2 0,yl, unID, fy, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -1, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,fy+yl, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Middle-Left-Top HOTSPOT2 0,yl, unID, flwl, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, yl, unID, flwl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl, yl, unID, flwl, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl,0, unID, yl, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,-1, unID, yl, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl,yl, unID, yl, 2 : unID=unID+1
!! *** Right-Bottom HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl-yr, unID, flwr, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx-1,yl-yr, unID, flwr, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+flwr,yl-yr, unID, flwr, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+flwr,yl, unID, yr, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+flwr,yl+1, unID, yr, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+flwr,yl-yr, unID, yr, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** Middle-Right-Top HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl, unID, yr, 1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl+1, unID, yr, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl-yr, unID, yr, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl,yl, unID, fx, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl-1,yl, unID, fx, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl, unID, fx, 2 : unID=unID+1
!! *** Right-top HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl+fy, unID, flwr, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx-1,yl+fy, unID, flwr, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+flwr,yl+fy, unID, flwr, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+flwr,yl, unID, fy, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+flwr,yl-1, unID, fy, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+flwr,yl+fy, unID, fy, 2 : unID=unID+1
DRAWINDEX 20 POLY2_b 9, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0,0,1, 0, yl+fy,1, flwl+fx+flwr, fy+yl, 1, flwl+fx+flwr, yl-yr,1, flwl+fx, yl-yr,1, flwl+fx, yl,1, flwl, yl,1, flwl, 0,1, 0,0,-1
DRAWINDEX 10 IF strings THEN POLY2_b 9, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0,0, 0, yl+fy,0, flwl+flwr+fx, fy+yl,0, flwl+flwr+fx, yl-yr,1, flwl+flwr+fx+st, yl-yr,1, flwl+flwr+fx+st, yl+fy+st,1, -st, fy+yl+st,1, -st, 0,1, 0,0,-1 POLY2_b 9, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, flwl, 0,0, flwl, yl,0, flwl+fx, yl,0, flwl+fx, yl-yr,1, flwl+fx-st, yl-yr,1, flwl+fx-st, yl-st,1, flwl+st, yl-st,1, flwl+st, 0,1, flwl, 0,-1
!!! *** LEFT FLIGHT -BOTTOM/LEFT direction HOTSPOT2 0,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** LEFT FLIGHT -BOTTOM/RIGHT direction HOTSPOT2 flwl,0, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl-1,0, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+st,0, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** RIGHT FLIGHT -BOTTOM/RIGHT direction HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx,yl-yr, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx+1,yl-yr, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx-st,yl-yr, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** RIGHT FLIGHT -BOTTOM/LEFT direction HOTSPOT2 flwl+flwr+fx,yl-yr, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+flwr+fx-1,yl-yr, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+flwr+fx+st,yl-yr, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** TOP HOTSPOT2 (flwl+flwr+fx)/2,fy+yl, unID, st, 1+128 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (flwl+flwr+fx)/2,fy+yl, unID, st, 3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (flwl+flwr+fx)/2,fy+yl+st, unID, st, 2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 flwl+st,yl-st, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+fx-st,yl-st, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -st,fy+yl+st, unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 flwl+flwr+fx+st,fy+yl+st, unID : unID=unID+1
ENDIF
ENDIF
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS=0.0001
LOCK "A", "B", "ZZYZX"
dim stLandingTypeValues[3] stLandingTypeValues[1] = `П-образная` stLandingTypeValues[2] = `Г-образная` stLandingTypeValues[3] = `Прямой`
dim stDetlev3DValues[3] stDetlev3DValues[1] = `Детальный` stDetlev3DValues[2] = `Простой` stDetlev3DValues[3] = `Откл.`
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters all
!!! Wooden Landing
values "stLandingType" stLandingTypeValues values "iLandingType" 1, 2, 3
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "stLandingType" then iLandingType = 1 if stLandingType = stLandingTypeValues[2] then iLandingType = 2 if stLandingType = stLandingTypeValues[3] then iLandingType = 3 parameters iLandingType = iLandingType else stLandingType = stLandingTypeValues[1] if iLandingType = 2 then stLandingType = stLandingTypeValues[2] if iLandingType = 3 then stLandingType = stLandingTypeValues[3] parameters stLandingType = stLandingType endif
values "gs_detlevel_3D" stDetlev3DValues values "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 if gs_detlevel_3D = stDetlev3DValues[2] then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 if gs_detlevel_3D = stDetlev3DValues[3] then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m else gs_detlevel_3D = stDetlev3DValues[1] if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then gs_detlevel_3D = stDetlev3DValues[2] if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then gs_detlevel_3D = stDetlev3DValues[3] parameters gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D endif
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
VALUES "flwl" RANGE (0,) VALUES "flwr" RANGE (0,) VALUES "fx" RANGE (0,) VALUES "fy" RANGE (0,) VALUES "yl" RANGE (0,) VALUES "yr" RANGE (0,) VALUES "lth" RANGE (0,) VALUES "sh" RANGE (0,) VALUES "st" RANGE (0,) VALUES "softh" RANGE (0,) VALUES "ns" RANGE [0,)
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
IF iLandingType = 3 THEN PARAMETERS a=flwl PARAMETERS b=fy ENDIF
IF iLandingType = 2 THEN PARAMETERS a=flwl+fx PARAMETERS b=fy+yl ENDIF
IF iLandingType = 1 THEN PARAMETERS a=flwl+fx+flwr PARAMETERS b=fy+MAX(yl,yr) ENDIF
IF strings=1 THEN PARAMETERS zzyzx=sh ELSE IF soffit=1 THEN PARAMETERS zzyzx=lth+softh ELSE PARAMETERS zzyzx=lth ENDIF ENDIF
!!! *** Hide and LOCK PARAMETERS *** !!!!
IF iLandingType = 3 THEN HIDEPARAMETER "flwr","fx","yl","yr" IF iLandingType = 2 THEN HIDEPARAMETER "flwr","yr"
IF strings=0 THEN hideparameter "sh","st","matstr","mat_riser", "penLineStringer", "typeFillStringer", "penFillStringer", "penBackFillStringer", "penLineRiser", "typeFillRiser", "penFillRiser", "penBackFillRiser" IF soffit=0 THEN hideparameter "softh","matsoff", "penLineSoffit", "typeFillSoffit", "penFillSoffit", "penBackFillSoffit"
! --- Connecting integer and section pencolor type parameters ---
dim iPenNumber[255] for i=1 to 255 iPenNumber[i]=i next i
values "gs_cont_pen" iPenNumber values "gs_fill_pen" iPenNumber values "penLineStringer" iPenNumber values "penFillStringer" iPenNumber values "penLineTread" iPenNumber values "penFillTread" iPenNumber values "penLineRiser" iPenNumber values "penFillRiser" iPenNumber values "penLineSoffit" iPenNumber values "penFillSoffit" iPenNumber
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penLineStringer_m" then if penLineStringer_m < -1 | penLineStringer_m > 255 then penLineStringer_m = 1 parameters penLineStringer_m = penLineStringer_m endif parameters penLineStringer = penLineStringer_m else parameters penLineStringer_m = penLineStringer endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penFillStringer_m" then if penFillStringer_m < -1 | penFillStringer_m > 255 then penFillStringer_m = 1 parameters penFillStringer_m = penFillStringer_m endif parameters penFillStringer = penFillStringer_m else parameters penFillStringer_m = penFillStringer endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penLineTread_m" then if penLineTread_m < 1 | penLineTread_m > 255 then penLineTread_m = 1 parameters penLineTread_m = penLineTread_m endif parameters penLineTread = penLineTread_m else parameters penLineTread_m = penLineTread endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penFillTread_m" then if penFillTread_m < 1 | penFillTread_m > 255 then penFillTread_m = 1 parameters penFillTread_m = penFillTread_m endif parameters penFillTread = penFillTread_m else parameters penFillTread_m = penFillTread endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penLineRiser_m" then if penLineRiser_m < 1 | penLineRiser_m > 255 then penLineRiser_m = 1 parameters penLineRiser_m = penLineRiser_m endif parameters penLineRiser = penLineRiser_m else parameters penLineRiser_m = penLineRiser endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penFillRiser_m" then if penFillRiser_m < 1 | penFillRiser_m > 255 then penFillRiser_m = 1 parameters penFillRiser_m = penFillRiser_m endif parameters penFillRiser = penFillRiser_m else parameters penFillRiser_m = penFillRiser endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penLineSoffit_m" then if penLineSoffit_m < 1 | penLineSoffit_m > 255 then penLineSoffit_m = 1 parameters penLineSoffit_m = penLineSoffit_m endif parameters penLineSoffit = penLineSoffit_m else parameters penLineSoffit_m = penLineSoffit endif if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penFillSoffit_m" then if penFillSoffit_m < 1 | penFillSoffit_m > 255 then penFillSoffit_m = 1 parameters penFillRiser_m = penFillSoffit_m endif parameters penFillSoffit = penFillSoffit_m else parameters penFillSoffit_m = penFillSoffit endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penBackFillStringer_m" then if penBackFillStringer_m < -1 | penBackFillStringer_m > 255 then penBackFillStringer_m = 1 parameters penBackFillStringer_m = penBackFillStringer_m endif parameters penBackFillStringer = penBackFillStringer_m else parameters penBackFillStringer_m = penBackFillStringer endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penBackFillTread_m" then if penBackFillTread_m < -1 | penBackFillTread_m > 255 then penBackFillTread_m = 1 parameters penBackFillTread_m = penBackFillTread_m endif parameters penBackFillTread = penBackFillTread_m else parameters penBackFillTread_m = penBackFillTread endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penBackFillRiser_m" then if penBackFillRiser_m < -1 | penBackFillRiser_m > 255 then penBackFillRiser_m = 1 parameters penBackFillRiser_m = penBackFillRiser_m endif parameters penBackFillRiser = penBackFillRiser_m else parameters penBackFillRiser_m = penBackFillRiser endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "penBackFillSoffit_m" then if penBackFillSoffit_m < -1 | penBackFillSoffit_m > 255 then penBackFillSoffit_m = 1 parameters penBackFillSoffit_m = penBackFillSoffit_m endif parameters penBackFillSoffit = penBackFillSoffit_m else parameters penBackFillSoffit_m = penBackFillSoffit endif
